scripts.generate-sdk-ruby: rm -r ./tmp/ruby;openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=ruby;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./tmp/reference/ruby/OpenAPI.json -g ruby -o ./tmp/ruby -t ./mustache-templates/ruby-client --additional-properties=gemName=VoucherifySdk,gemVersion=1.0.0
scripts.generate-sdk-ruby-for-tests: npm run generate-sdk-ruby;cd ./tmp/ruby && gem build VoucherifySdk.gemspec;gem install ./VoucherifySdk-1.0.0.gem
scripts.generate-sdk-python: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=python;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./tmp/reference/python/OpenAPI.json -g python -o ./tmp/python -t ./mustache-templates/python
scripts.generate-sdk-php: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=php;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./tmp/reference/php/OpenAPI.json -g php-nextgen -o ./tmp/php -t ./mustache-templates/php-nextgen
scripts.generate-sdk-java: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=java;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./tmp/reference/java/OpenAPI.json -g java -o ./tmp/java -t ./mustache-templates/Java
